title: Client turns into a little corner post game.
body:
Just got a new computer and the screen is slightly smaller. I was messing with my resolution settings in game and the window size settings to try to get things back close to the way they were on my old computer. Somewhere along the line my client started to bug out. It cramps into a tiny box when a game finishes. I can't honor or do anything, I can't even log out properly, I have to use task manager to force close league. I know I can fix it by going back to the original settings, but that's incredibly annoying since everything feels too tiny. Is there a way to fix this or at least work around it while not having to go back to the defaults?

http://imgur.com/a/A7cP7
Attached a screenshot of the bug too. The client is the little black rectangle new to the recycle bin

replies.body:
This could happen on a 4K, but your settings may have messed up a bit during adjustment.  As a first try, you can rescale your client by tapping CTRL and the + sign on your keyboard.  

If the issue persists, close out the client and try a config reset:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps.

i play on 1920x1080 and this happends to me. I have the same setup since 6 months and the bug only appeared this patch and last patch.

1x250gb SSD (game is installed on SSD just like my windows)
2x500gb HDD
i7 4470k
2x8GB DDR4 ram
GeForce GTX 1060 3gb

It kinda helped. After reseting my settings (lol) I found out the problem only happens if the client is on 1600x900. My game settings aren't screwing it up, thank god for that, i hated feeling so zoomed out. Thanks man.
thanks for precisely showing an image of what the problem was, been waiting for months for this to be addressed and a quick fix for it. Mines is now fixed thanks to you

This thread was very hard for me to find, Been having this problem the entire client update. Stopped playing for 2 months and thought this was a bug that'll eventually be fixed and that I wasn't the only one with this bug. finally after months and months of waiting such a simple fix within navigating files to fix this issue. Worked 100% on the spot and it isn't just for 4k. Please share so others won't suffer like me lol

FIX - Ive figured out how to solve it, after reinstalling it had same problem, so i UNINSTALLED the game, made sure all RIOT FOLDERS were DELETED AND, you must check " SEE HIDDEN FILES " and go to "C:\ProgramData\Riot Games\" and DELETE the file " machine.cfg " ( this is the file that's messing up with resolution and i dont know why it just worked for me ( im using windows 8.1 just so you know ). 
After all these are deleted, it might also help to restart your pc,then reinstall game :) 

HOPE IT WORKS
